word: BUT SEVENTH-DAY ADVENTISTS ARE DIFFERENT. THEY REJOICE IN THE POSSIBILITY OF DAILY CHANGE AFTER THE LIKENESS OF JESUS. FURTHER, THEY BELIEVE NOT ONLY THAT THIS GROWTH HAS TO DO WITH THE SOUL BUT THAT IT IS REFLECTED IN ALL ASPECTS OF LIVING, WHETHER HEALTH, EDUCATION, CITIZENSHIP, OR PARENTING. THEY REFER TO THIS RENEWAL AND GROWTH PROCESS AS CHARACTER DEVELOPMENT.
